description: An Apple HealthKit category sample, describing categorical values.

___category_type.description: The category type for this sample.

___category_value.description: The category value for this sample.

___effective_time_frame.description: The time frame when this sample occurred. When the HKSample `startDate` and `endDate` values are different, we recommend using the `time_interval` time frame property, and when they are the same, we recommend using the `date_time` time frame property.

___metadata.description: An array of extra information describing this sample.
